price: او نه به راته هغوی ته هیڅ رسول مګر حال دا چې وو به دوی چې په هغه پورې به یې مسخری کولې.
arabic: وَمَا يَأۡتِيهِم مِّن رَّسُولٍ إِلَّا كَانُواْ بِهِۦ يَسۡتَهۡزِءُونَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: wamā yatīhim min rasūlin illā kānū bihi yastahziūna
